name: Tyrant
description: Commanders who rule through fear and intimidation, crushing opposition with brutal tactics and forcing absolute obedience from their followers while building empires on the broken wills of others.

resource_systems.name: Stamina
resource_systems.description: Physical energy that powers combat abilities and brutal tactics
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when inflicting fear or pain
mechanics: Stamina points are spent to perform special combat maneuvers and intimidation tactics
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming stamina over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum stamina
Depleted stamina causes penalties to attack speed and intimidation effectiveness
Can be temporarily boosted through displays of dominance in critical situations
Inflicting pain and fear on enemies increases stamina regeneration

resource_systems.name: Combat Readiness
resource_systems.description: State of tactical awareness and preparation that enhances combat effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds during combat, decreases during periods of inaction
mechanics: Increases by 20 when landing critical hits or successfully intimidating enemies
Increases by 15 per 10 seconds in active combat
Decreases by 20 when intimidation fails or when challenged successfully
Decreases by 15 per minute when out of combat
Can be spent to enhance combat abilities or execute brutal maneuvers
Can be partially transferred to subordinates to improve their combat performance
Displays of dominance significantly increase Combat Readiness

resource_systems.name: Command Authority
resource_systems.description: Measure of leadership influence and control over subordinates
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully intimidating others or demonstrating power
mechanics: Increases by 15 when subordinates obey commands out of fear
Increases by 10 when crushing opposition or making examples of enemies
Decreases by 15 when subordinates defy orders or show resistance
Decreases by 10 when showing weakness or failing to maintain dominance
Can be spent to issue powerful commands or implement brutal battle strategies
Higher Command Authority increases the fear and submission of subordinates

resource_systems.name: Reign of Terror
resource_systems.description: Measure of the fear and intimidation you instill in both enemies and followers
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when demonstrating cruelty or crushing opposition
mechanics: Increases by 15 when executing brutal punishments or displays of power
Increases by 20 when breaking an enemy's will completely
Decreases by 10 when showing mercy or compassion
Decreases by 15 when challenged without immediate retaliation
Can be spent to create overwhelming fear or force absolute obedience
At maximum Reign of Terror, enter a state of terrifying dominance that paralyzes enemies with fear

class_mechanics.name: Brutal Intimidation
class_mechanics.description: Ability to instill paralyzing fear in enemies and absolute obedience in followers
effects: Can terrify enemies, potentially causing them to flee or surrender
Able to force obedience from subordinates through fear alone
Can break the will of captured enemies, turning them into loyal servants
Presence naturally causes unease and hesitation in opponents
Can establish dominance hierarchies that function even in your absence

class_mechanics.name: Cruel Efficiency
class_mechanics.description: Ruthless approach to warfare that prioritizes results over all other concerns
effects: Can implement brutal tactics that other commanders would find unconscionable
Able to sacrifice subordinates without hesitation for tactical advantage
Can exploit fear and pain to extract maximum performance from followers
Presence drives subordinates to exceed their normal capabilities out of fear
Can identify and exploit the most psychologically devastating tactics

class_mechanics.name: Iron Rule
class_mechanics.description: Absolute control over subordinates through a combination of fear and reward
effects: Can establish a system of punishment and reward that ensures absolute loyalty
Able to detect and preempt betrayal or disobedience before it occurs
Can force subordinates to fight beyond their normal limits
Presence reinforces the hierarchy of command, preventing dissent
Can break and rebuild the will of potential rivals, turning them into servants

class_mechanics.name: Dominating Presence
class_mechanics.description: Overwhelming physical and psychological presence that intimidates enemies and inspires fear
effects: Physical presence appears more imposing and threatening than normal
Can focus attention on a single target, causing them to feel isolated and vulnerable
Able to project an aura of menace that weakens enemy resolve
Presence can cause physical symptoms of fear in susceptible targets
Can establish psychological dominance in social interactions through subtle cues

signature_abilities.name: Absolute Dominance
signature_abilities.description: Assert complete psychological control over the battlefield through overwhelming fear
mechanics: For 3 minutes, project an aura of terror that affects all enemies within 50 meters
Weaker enemies flee in terror or surrender immediately
Stronger enemies suffer significant penalties to attack, defense, and morale
Allies gain immunity to fear and significant bonuses to damage
Each enemy that flees or surrenders extends the duration by 10 seconds
Costs 100 Stamina, 50 Command Authority, and 75 Reign of Terror

signature_abilities.name: Rule Through Fear
signature_abilities.description: Make a brutal example of an enemy to terrify others and empower followers
mechanics: Target a single enemy for a devastating attack that deals massive damage
If the target is killed, their death creates a display of brutality visible to all
All enemies who witness this must make a will save or flee in terror
All allies who witness this gain significant combat bonuses for 10 minutes
The area becomes psychologically marked as your territory, giving you tactical advantages
Costs 75 Stamina, 30 Command Authority, and 50 Reign of Terror

signature_abilities.name: Tyrant Ascendant
signature_abilities.description: Transform into the embodiment of domination and terror
mechanics: For 2 minutes, become a terrifying manifestation of power and cruelty
Physical size increases by 50%, strength and constitution doubled
Each attack has a chance to inflict terror, potentially paralyzing enemies
Gain immunity to fear, mind control, and most control effects
Presence alone causes weaker enemies to cower or flee
Costs 50 Stamina, 100 Reign of Terror, and 25 Command Authority

skill_trees.name: Path of the Oppressor
key_abilities: Breaking Point: Identify and exploit an enemy's psychological weaknesses
Terrifying Presence: Your mere presence causes fear and hesitation in enemies
Crushed Will: Permanently reduce an enemy's will to fight through psychological domination

skill_trees.name: Path of the Despot
key_abilities: Absolute Authority: Force subordinates to obey even suicidal commands
Expendable Resources: Sacrifice subordinates for personal power or tactical advantage
Cult of Personality: Create fanatically loyal followers who worship you

skill_trees.name: Path of Brutality
key_abilities: Sadistic Strike: Inflict wounds that cause extreme pain, reducing enemy effectiveness
Brutal Execution: Perform devastating finishing moves that terrify witnesses
Pain Tolerance: Channel pain into power, gaining strength as you take damage

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Elite Warrior skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Break the will of a powerful enemy
Establish absolute control over a group through fear

legendary_items.name: Crown of Dominion
effects: Charisma increased by 5 when intimidating or commanding
Thoughts and intentions of subordinates are revealed to you
Can project an aura of dread that weakens the resolve of enemies

legendary_items.name: Tyrant's Fist
effects: Attacks have a chance to inflict terror in addition to physical damage
Critical hits create displays of brutality that intimidate all who witness them
Can absorb the fear of enemies to restore health and resources

legendary_items.name: Mantle of the Oppressor
effects: Reign of Terror maximum increased by 50
Physical presence becomes more imposing and intimidating
When Reign of Terror is at maximum, gain immunity to all control effects

lore: Tyrants represent the darkest path a Commander can take, having embraced the use of fear, intimidation, and cruelty as their primary tools of leadership. These masters of psychological domination have transcended ordinary military authority to become living embodiments of terror, capable of breaking the will of enemies and forcing absolute obedience from followers through the sheer force of their presence. The path to becoming a Tyrant requires not only exceptional combat skills and leadership abilities but also a willingness to use any means necessary to achieve dominance, regardless of moral considerations or human cost. Those who succeed find themselves capable of controlling others through fear alone, building empires on the broken wills of those they have conquered. Tyrants typically rule through carefully balanced systems of punishment and reward, ensuring that their subordinates fear failure more than death itself while offering just enough incentive to maintain loyalty. Many establish their own territories or military forces, ruling with iron fists and crushing any sign of resistance with overwhelming brutality. Others serve as enforcers or special operatives for larger organizations, deployed when absolute compliance is required or when examples need to be made. Their presence on the battlefield is often enough to break enemy morale before combat even begins, as their reputations for cruelty and the fate of those who oppose them spread far and wide. Though they may lack the moral authority of Champions or the tactical subtlety of Warlords, the psychological dominance and brutal efficiency of Tyrants make them perhaps the most feared military leaders in existence.
